projects.title: NayanEsports
projects.description: Nayan eSports WebApp is an e-commerce application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring an online store for gaming accessories. I developed a responsive interface and implemented a dynamic shopping cart system.

projects.title: Canvas Template
projects.description: A versatile web application for creating, editing, and managing custom templates. Users can add text, images, and shapes to their designs, save their work, and download high-quality PNG files.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: A dynamic portfolio website built with React and Firebase, showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. The site features a modern design and offering a comprehensive view of my professional journey and achievements.

projects.title: NaySol
projects.description: This App is made using React. This app provides Solution to coding related problems.

projects.title: Text-Utils
projects.description: Text-Utils is used to apply different operations on your text made with React .
